sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import { Card, CardHeader, CardContent, Typography, Grid } from '@mui/material'; import { makeStyles } from '@mui/styles'; import { AccountCircle, Email, Business, LocationOn, Phone, BusinessCenter, CreditCard, People } from '@mui/icons-material'; import profile from './profile.png'; // Importing the profile image const useStyles = makeStyles((theme) => ({ card: { width: '1000px', margin: 'auto', marginTop: theme.spacing(20), backgroundColor: 'transparent', // Transparent background boxShadow: '0px 0px 30px rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.5)', // Golden shadow effect borderRadius: '10px', // Rounded corners padding: theme.spacing(3), // Add padding border: '1px solid #ffd700', // Golden border }, typography: { fontFamily: 'Times New Roman', // Times New Roman font family color: '#333333', fontSize: '1.6rem', // Increased font size display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', // Centering the icon and text vertically marginBottom: theme.spacing(2), // Add some margin at the bottom }, icon: { marginRight: theme.spacing(1), // Adding space between icon and text color: '#ffd700', // Golden color for icons }, })); const UserProfileCard = () => { const classes = useStyles(); return ( } sx={{ textAlign: 'center' }} /> Name: John Doe Email: john.doe@example.com Business Type: Retail Business Branches: 5 Phone Number: Company: ABC Corporation Expected Credit: $10,000 Number of Employees: 20 ); }; export default UserProfileCard;
